message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm willing to part with it for $1,300,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value I can get out of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value this product holds for me is quite significant.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,225,000.  I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1,225,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
